category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: Cfg0ConfigurationRetentionPeriod
preference.preference_description: (Deprecated)Defines the time interval in seconds by which the Configurator data cache (e.g. for variant options and constraint rules) has to age before the system considers a refresh. This limits the frequency of updating the Configurator data cache to a maximum of once in this interval.
